title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Jul 11 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Jul 11 2022
description:
Carrie said yes! Buck's engaged! In Asheville, Buck asked for her hand from her father. Congratulations to the happy couple, who had a perfect sunset and view of the NYC skyline behind them as it happened. Joe Biden’s job approval rating in New York Times poll hits 33%. Clay says, "If Joe Biden's approval rating is at 33% in the New York Times poll, which is effectively an all-time low, I believe, for Biden, what is it in reality?" Just 26% of Democrats believe he should be renominated in 2024. NYT tells Biden not to run. Kamala Harris gives another nonsensical word salad answer on Roe v. Wade. Novak Djokovic wins Wimbledon, but he's barred from U.S. Open unless he gets covid shot. Blockbuster story: First 2 covid shots found to be only 5% effective, 3 shots only 20% effective. Blue states, NEA gearing up for mask, vax mandates. Randi Weingarten twists poll on politicization of schools.

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

Carrie said yes! Buck's engaged! In Asheville, Buck asked for her hand from her father. Congratulations to the happy couple, who had a perfect sunset and view of the NYC skyline behind them as it happened. Joe Biden’s job approval rating in New York Times poll hits 33%. Clay says, "If Joe Biden's approval rating is at 33% in the New York Times poll, which is effectively an all-time low, I believe, for Biden, what is it in reality?" Just 26% of Democrats believe he should be renominated in 2024. NYT tells Biden not to run. Kamala Harris gives another nonsensical word salad answer on Roe v. Wade. Novak Djokovic wins Wimbledon, but he's barred from U.S. Open unless he gets covid shot. Blockbuster story: First 2 covid shots found to be only 5% effective, 3 shots only 20% effective. Blue states, NEA gearing up for mask, vax mandates. Randi Weingarten twists poll on politicization of schools.
